mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` (user_id, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, regdate, user_role, user_del) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userNickname}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, NOW(), 0, 0);
mapper.select: select user_nickname, user_idx from user where user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from user where user_id=#{id}
select count(*) from user where user_email=#{email}
select count(*) from user where user_nickname=#{nickname}
